text:
...In the end, it's already the day of the interview.
sigh
"We're Alstroemeria with Chiyuki, Amana, and Tenka."
I'll make sure to convey that properly.

I added the Osaki Custom to Chiyuki-san's favorite accessory☆
I wanted to make it fancy to match the yukata!

I want Chiyuki-san to wear this
and be the star of today's interview!

Um, thank you for this at the beginning...!
The hair accessory is so cute!

Um, you see, I
don't have... a sash...

I put my feelings into this...
For Amana-chan and Tenka-chan──...

...The warp threads, you see, Three threads
come together to create various patterns.

So with this sash, I wanted to create
something that would make you both shine...

It's a bit late, but...
I thought about where I want to go myself.

But, I still feel like anywhere is fine...
I just want to help you both shine──
